snippet: Generic personal finance advice can be dangerous, since the finance part of it may not apply to your personal situation.
abstract: Generic personal finance advice can be dangerous, since the finance part of it may not apply to your personal situation.
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His new book, "The Behavior Gap," was published this week, and we'll be running excerpts all week long. Meanwhile, his sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog.

headline.main: Stranger Danger: Personal Finance Really Is Personal
